charinfo.name: Ao (S)
charinfo.description: Ao (S) is a hunter-nin of the Hidden Mist Village and a skilled sensor. Ao is a veteran shinobi who has been in many battles, one of his spoils of war is the byakugan he possesses.

abilities.name: Stolen Byakugan
abilities.description: Ao uses his Stolen Byakugan and gains 5 points of damage reduction for 3 turns. During this skill Ao will deal 10 damage* to any enemy that uses a non-mental skill on him.

abilities.name: Sensing Barrier
abilities.description: Ao uses Sensing Barrier on 1 enemy dealing 25 damage. That enemy will not be able to reduce damage or go invulnerable for 1 turn.

abilities.name: Byakugan Seal
abilities.description: Using Byakugan Seal Ao will counter all non mental enemy skills used on him for 1 turn. All countered enemy's skills will cost 1 additional random chakra for 1 turn. This skill is invisible.

abilities.name: Reactionary Defense
abilities.description: This skill makes Ao (S) invulnerable for 1 turn.
